name: Heart to Heart
description:
Use the mouse to guide your friends through this abstract, hand drawn story. Click elements to interact and overcome obstacles.

Heart to Heart is our submission for "Strength in Numbers" Rainbow Jam 2020!

by team Fruit Jam

  • Art, Code, Story - Cooper (definitelymango.itch.io)
  • Music, Sound - Giant Peach Audio (giantpeachaudio.itch.io)
